snippet.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Shredder Reborn mobile game
snippet.description:
Welcome back to the world of the best known ninja heroes  Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael and Michelangelo in our new action adventure mobile game (http://tmnt2.4-mobile.org)!

In the first part of their adventure, which you could experience in the TMNT: The Ninja Tribunal game, our heroes tried to prevent the resurrection of the original Shredder, the greatest evil that ever walked the Earth. Guided by the mystical Ninja Tribunal, they learned many new abilities and skills that should have helped them to fulfill this task.
However, they did not succeed fully, and now the Shredder returns. But the fight is still not over. It continues in the streets of New York, changed by Shredders dark powers into a hellish place full of demons and undead monsters. 
There is still hope that the Shredder may be defeated...
